about_the_game:
CYBRID: Survivor - is a single-player shooter with survival elements. Use your entire arsenal, fight hordes of robots, mine resources and unlock powerful upgrades as you clean up the streets at night. You are alone, against everyone!



Kill cyborgs, improve your equipment and clear the streets of the night city. Collect and assemble a devastating array of weapons, unleash hell on wave after wave of fast and frantic combat, and fight your way in search of new data. Each mission is unique, using procedural generation of weapons and waves of enemies.

Initial release on early access includes:

  • 2 classes
  • 2 biomes
  • A deep progression system of class mods and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

From Developer


The game is made by the forces of one person
